meanings.sent1: That painting is a real doozy in the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display last night was a doozy!
meanings.sent3: I never expected to see such a doozy of a cake at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for playing the piano is a doozy among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The diamond necklace she wore was a doozy, sparkling in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A remarkable or extraordinary person or thing
meanings.sent1: My grandma is a real doozy when it comes to baking cookies.
meanings.sent2: The magician's tricks were a doozy at the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot at the pet store was quite a doozy to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to solve puzzles quickly is a doozy among her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The antique clock in the living room is a doozy, ticking loudly every hour.

meanings.sent1: Getting lost in the maze was a real doozy for the kids.
meanings.sent2: The power outage during the storm was a doozy to deal with.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the Christmas lights was a doozy of a task.
meanings.sent4: The traffic jam on the highway was a doozy, causing delays for hours.
meanings.sent5: The leak in the roof was a doozy, dripping water into the living room.
